column1: in memory of phillip c. adkins -- gary kelley's add'vantage funeral and cremation service| first: last: phillip c. adkins october 17
column9: alaska. phillip served in the united states army and was a plumber by trade. no services are planned. condolences may be posted to the guestbook located on this page. photographs and may also be submitted to this online memorial. gary kelley'sadd'vantage funeral and cremation service9761 east 31st street. tulsa
